meanings.definition: The process in which two or more unsaturated molecules combine to form a cyclic compound.
meanings.sent1: The cycloaddition of molecules creates new rings.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the cycloaddition of compounds in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The cycloaddition of ingredients in the recipe made a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a cycloaddition of ideas, forming a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The cycloaddition of colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: A chemical reaction in which two or more unsaturated molecules combine to form a cyclic compound.
meanings.sent1: During the cycloaddition, new molecules are formed.
meanings.sent2: The cycloaddition is an important step in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The cycloaddition of elements in the experiment surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The cycloaddition of thoughts in her mind led to a breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: In the cycloaddition of compounds, bonds are rearranged.
